module.name: profiles
module.description: Building a community website requires you to provide a certain interface to your visitors. An interface that allows them to create and maintain a profile on your website. The profiles module contains all the basic functionality to get started: * Registration * Login/Logout * Forgot password * Modifying profile settings * Resending activation mails
